setup_script_description: sets focus on the 'Style/Color' menu item
task: read unchecked menuitemradio in a group in a submenu
specific_user_instruction: Open "Style/Color" menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Blue' menu item radio with down arrow. | Read the  'Blue' menu item radio
output_assertions: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the 'Text Color' group are conveyed
The name and role of the 'Text Color' group are conveyed
